segments.text: Thanks . I finally got rid of that old Nissan that got me through college .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is this , the new Ford ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , it ’ s last year ’ s model .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True . How much did you pay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 14,500 . It only has 10,000 miles on it , so it ’ s like a new car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does that mean you ’ re not going to take the train to work anymore ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sometimes , I think it ’ ll be nice to drive to work instead . We ’ ll see . Want to go for a ride ?
segments.speaker: S2
